text: Melanophryniscus (South American Redbelly Toads) is a genus of toads. There are 25 amphibian species located in Argentina, south of Bolivia, Brazil, Paraguay and Uruguay. == Species == Binomial Name and Author Common Name Melanophryniscus admirabilis Melanophryniscus alipioi Melanophryniscus atroluteus Uruguay Redbelly Toad Melanophryniscus cambaraensis Brazilian Redbelly Toad Melanophryniscus cupreuscapularis Melanophryniscus devincenzii Rivera Redbelly Toad Melanophryniscus dorsalis Melanophryniscus estebani Melanophryniscus fulvoguttatus Melanophryniscus klappenbachi Melanophryniscus krauczuki Melanophryniscus langonei Melanophryniscus macrogranulosus Torres Redbelly Toad Melanophryniscus montevidensis Montevideo Redbelly Toad Melanophryniscus moreirae Maldonado Redbelly Toad Melanophryniscus orejasmirandai Orejas-Miranda Redbelly Toad Melanophryniscus pachyrhynus Melanophryniscus paraguayensis Melanophryniscus rubriventris Yungas Redbelly Toad Melanophryniscus sanmartini San Martin Redbelly Toad Melanophryniscus simplex Melanophryniscus spectabilis Melanophryniscus stelzneri Redbelly Toad Melanophryniscus tumifrons Swelling Redbelly Toad Melanophryniscus vilavelhensis ==Other websites== * . 2007.
